CustomField.description: The value in this field will be "Inside SLA"if the following conditions are true: [Final Enrollment Audit Complete] = FALSE AND NOW() is less than or equal to the [Final Enrollment Target Time] The value in this field will be "Outside SLA" if the following conditions are true: [Final Enrollment Audit Complete] = FALSE AND NOW() is greater than the [Final Enrollment Target Time]
CustomField.formula: IF(Final_Enrollment_Audit_Complete__c = false && (NOW() <= Final_Enrollment_Target_Time__c ), "Inside SLA", IF(Final_Enrollment_Audit_Complete__c = false && (NOW() > Final_Enrollment_Target_Time__c ), "Outside SLA", "") )
CustomField.label: Final Enrollment Audit (W) SLA
